trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: Hew has resistance to poison damage and advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of his turn, Hew can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against him have advantage until the start of his next turn.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.
